name: Mosque
strategy: Can only be built in cities following a religion with the Mosques belief. Construct this building by purchasing it with Faith.
historical_info: The mosque serves as the traditional place of worship for the followers of Islam. The largest mosque in the world, the Madjid al-Haram was built in the city of Mecca, in Saudi Arabia, around 638 AD. Also known as the Grand Mosque, the Madjid al-Haram encompasses the holy site of the Kaaba, the most sacred of all locations in the Islamic religion.
